title: Coverlet, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Coverlet containing 1 full width in the center, partial width at right, pieced with fragments at left. The design on the fabric is a stripe at the left with a nymph and a satyr in a medallion on a picottage ground. In the field frolicking sea gods, a fountain with the royal crossed 'L's' and genre scenes. In two red and blue on white. Coverlet is quilted, stuffed, and lined with linen plain weave.

tombstone.epitaph:
Coverlet, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-240.
